name: Desk wars
description:
Protect your base from giant spiders in this Augmented-Reality minigame!

Place walls and turrets around your base building using the "Place " buttons, then control the turrets with the "Control Turrets" button. Spawn in spiders to fight them with the "Spawn Spiders" button. No health bars are implemented yet, but spiders have 100 health, your base has 1000 health, and walls have 200 health. Spiders do 20 damage per second, and you do 20 damage per bullet.
